inclusion.criterion: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus of more than 1 year
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: GFR less than 30 ml/min/1.73m2 or dialysis
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Entry blood glucose (fasting or random) greater than 180mg%
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years and has been on insulin since diagnosis. He is currently experiencing hyperglycemia after not taking his insulin for 3 days.
